about_the_game:
Double the storage capacity of the "Video" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Video Links Extension DLC!

This optional DLC adds an extra 15 pages to the "Video" section, doubling the capacity from 150 links to 300 links!

content_descriptors.notes: The base Online Adult Content Manager is intended for an adult purpose and audience.

detailed_description:
Double the storage capacity of the "Video" section with the Online Adult Content Manager - Video Links Extension DLC!

This optional DLC adds an extra 15 pages to the "Video" section, doubling the capacity from 150 links to 300 links!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.
